title: Superhuman Builds Engine to Manage Email Faster
itunes:title: Superhuman Builds Engine to Manage Email Faster
description:
Rahul Vohra, CEO of startup Superhuman, discusses building tools for more efficiently dealing with email which can help businesses increase productivity. He also talks about the importance of the "three sentence rule" when sending an email.

Hosts: Jason Kelly and Taylor Riggs. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
